title: Dental Cleaning & Checkup
description: Comprehensive dental cleaning, examination, and preventive care services including fluoride treatment and oral health assessment.

title: Tooth Extraction
description: Professional tooth extraction services including wisdom teeth removal, with post-operative care and pain management support.

title: Mental Health Counseling
description: Licensed therapy sessions for anxiety, depression, stress management, and emotional wellbeing with certified mental health professionals.

title: Vision Test & Eye Exam
description: Comprehensive eye examination including vision screening, prescription updates, and early detection of eye conditions.

title: General OPD Consultation
description: Outpatient department consultations with general practitioners for common health concerns, prescriptions, and medical advice.

title: Root Canal Treatment
description: Advanced endodontic treatment to save infected teeth, including cleaning, shaping, and sealing of root canals.
